We want to understand quantum chaos, where chaos manifest itself in the statistical properties of our system.
To do this, we will study a quantum system whose classical counterpart is chaotic: the quantum billiard. You can click [here](https://kiize.github.io/Quantum_Chaos/tex/qchaos.pdf) to view the pdf version of this work.
